evaluating models. The data in a given dataset will be divided into standard weeks. These are
weeks that begin on a Sunday and end on a Saturday. This is a realistic and useful way for
using the chosen framing of the model, where the power consumption for the week ahead can
be predicted. It is also helpful with modeling, where models can be used to predict a speciÔ¨Åc
